resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81753</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81753</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4989</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Trip to Mars</string>
            <string language="es">Viaje a Marte</string>
            <string language="ga">Turas chuig Mars</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reise zu Mars</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voyage à Mars</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desengate a Marte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Viaggio a Marte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταξίδι στον Αρη</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Class activity involving a guided meditation, followed by some teacher input. The students are then given a worksheet to complete and are divided into small groups to share their answers.</string>
            <string language="es">Actividad para la clase en la que se hace una meditación guiada seguida de un comentario del profesor. Después se les da a los estudiantes una hoja de trabajo para que la rellenen y se dividen en pequeños grupos para compartir sus respuestas.</string>
            <string language="ga">Gníomhaíocht ranga le machnamh treoraithe, le hionchur an mhúinteora ina dhiaidh. Tugtar bileog oibre ansin do na daltaí le líonadh agus bristear ina ngrúpaí beaga iad chun a bhfreagraí a roinnt.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SPHE</string>
            <string language="es">SPHE. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">OSPS</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klassifizieren Sie die Aktivität, die eine 
geführte Meditation mit einbezieht, gefolgt von etwas Lehrerinput. 
Den Kursteilnehmern werden dann ein Bogen gegeben, zum 
durchzuführen und werden in kleine Gruppen, um ihre Antworten zu 
teilen geteilt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Classez l'activité impliquant une méditation 
guidée, suivie d'une certaine entrée de professeur. Les 
étudiants sont alors donnés un tableau à terminer et sont divisés 
en petits groupes pour partager leurs réponses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Classifique a atividade que envolve um meditation
guiado, seguido por alguma entrada do professor. Os estudantes 
então são dados uma folha a terminar e divididos em grupos pequenos 
para compartilhar de suas respostas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Classifichi l'attività che coinvolge una 
meditazione guidata, seguita da un certo input dell'insegnante. 
Gli allievi allora sono dati un foglio di lavoro da completare e
sono divisi nei piccoli gruppi per ripartire le loro risposte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δραστηριότητα κλάσης που περιλαμβάνει μια καθοδηγημένη
περισυλλογή, που ακολουθείται από κάποια είσοδο δασκάλων. 
Στους σπουδαστές δίνεται έπειτα ένα φύλλο εργασίας για να 
ολοκληρώσουν και διαιρούνται σε μικρές ομάδες για να μοιραστούν 
τις απαντήσεις τους.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
